com.purbon.search.fair

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.purbon.search.fair.Core

  • public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as a wrapper around the utilities we have created for FA*IR ranking

      • createUnadjustedMTable

        public static int[] createUnadjustedMTable(int n,
                                           double p,
                                           double alpha)
        Creates an mtable using alpha unadjusted.
        Parameters:
        n - Total number of elements
        p - The proportion of protected candidates in the top-k ranking
        alpha - The significance level
        Returns:
        The generated mtable, which is a int[]

                                 double p,

      • computeFailureProbability

        public static double computeFailureProbability(int[] mtable,
                                               int n,
                                               double p,
                                               double alpha)
        Computes analytically the probability that a ranking created with the simulator will fail to pass the mtable
        Parameters:
        mtable - The mtable to check against
        n - Total number of elements
        p - The proportion of protected candidates in the top-k ranking
        alpha - The significance level
        Returns:
        The adjusted alpha

      • checkRankingMTable

        public static boolean checkRankingMTable(org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs docs,
                                         int[] mtable)
        Checks if the ranking is fair for the given parameters
        Parameters:
        docs - The ranking to be checked
        mtable - The mtable against to check
        Returns:
        Returns whether the rankings statisfies the mtable

      • isFair

        public static boolean isFair(org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs docs,
                             int n,
                             double p,
                             double alpha)
        Checks if the ranking is fair for the given parameters
        Parameters:
        docs - The ranking to be checked
        n - Total number of elements
        p - The proportion of protected candidates in the top-k ranking
        alpha - The significance level
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean which specifies whether the ranking is fair
